casebody.data:
SIPING FANG, Petitioner,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable Mark R. Denton, District Judge, Respondents,
and
Michael Markbreiter; Zhang Qing; Michael Phillips; Deng Zhi Yong; Bob Ackerley; Charles Henri-Mangin; Newlight Horizon Fund, LP; and Ray Shi Small/Mid Cap Fund, Real Parties in Interest. No. 76513 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED SEPTEMBER 14, 2018

DENIED.
